<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Candle of Revealing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=710)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 257 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When lit, this black candle's eerie blue flame reveals the presence of invisible creatures. Within a 10-foot radius of the lit candle, creatures don't benefit from the [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) condition. Their bodies are outlined, not fully visible, so they are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4). Once lit, the candle burns for 1 minute, after which the effect ends. If extinguished, it can't be relit.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
